title: #163: Little (@FunnyBrad, @TonyHinchcliffe, @SarahTiana)
itunes:title: Little with Brad Williams, Tony Hinchcliffe, & Sarah Tiana
description: Brad Williams joined me on the patio of the Comedy Store one April afternoon to talk about what it's like to be a midget. He was open and honest and it was a fun, informative look at a different life experience.
content:encoded: Brad Williams joined me on the patio of the Comedy Store one April afternoon to talk about what it's like to be a midget. He was open and honest and it was a fun, informative look at a different life experience.
itunes:subtitle: Brad Williams joined me on the patio of the Comedy Store one April afternoon to talk about what it's like to be a midget. He was open and honest and it was a fun, informative look at a different life experience.
itunes:author: Ari Shaffir
